author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Kings Rising is one of those finales that left me staring blankly at a wall, trying to pretend all is fine while silently cursing (or thanking?) C.S. Pacat for delivering so many emotional gutpunches that just hurt oh so good. It easily takes the crown as the best instalment in the series, making everything that […]

The post REVIEW: Kings Rising by C.S. Pacat appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Kings Rising by C.S. Pacat
